sentences.sContent: If there is excessive daytime sleepiness and desire to nap, in spite of adequate sleep time, this might suggest a sleep disorder warranting further evaluation.
sentences.sContent_eng: If there is excessive daytime sleepiness and desire to nap, in spite of adequate sleep time, this might suggest a sleep disorder warranting further evaluation.
sentences.sCn: 如果白天有很强的睡意，想小睡一会，虽然有充足的睡眠时间，这也许意味着睡眠障碍需要进一步评估。

words.tran: 欲睡的；困乏的；不活跃的
